dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1428256706 at Thu Jul 15 17:20:09 UTC 2021

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

dataLinks.title: Gitaly Per-Node Service Aggregated SLIs Apdex SLO Analysis

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: Gitaly Per-Node Service Aggregated SLIs Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_node_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_node_apdex:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_node_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_node_apdex:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_node_apdex:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)
targets.legendFormat: Gitaly Per-Node Service Aggregated SLIs | Latency/Apdex

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

panels.title: Gitaly Per-Node Service Aggregated SLIs Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_node_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_node_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_node_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_node_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_node_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)
targets.legendFormat: Gitaly Per-Node Service Aggregated SLIs | Errors

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: gitalyruby SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

This SLI monitors requests to Gitaly's Ruby sidecar, known as Gitaly-Ruby. All requests made to
Gitaly-Ruby are monitored in aggregate, via its GRPC interface.



### Observability Tools

* [üêû Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitlabcom-gitaly-ruby](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom-gitaly-ruby/releases?environment=${environment})
* [üêû Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitlabcom-gitaly-ruby/issues?environment=${environment})
* [üìñ Kibana: Gitaly Ruby logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.hostname,json.grpc.method,json.grpc.request.glProjectPath,json.grpc.code,json.grpc.time_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),index:'AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Gitaly Ruby failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.hostname,json.grpc.method,json.grpc.request.glProjectPath,json.grpc.code,json.grpc.time_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase)))),(meta:(negate:!t),query:(match:(json.grpc.code:(query:OK,type:phrase)))),(exists:(field:json.grpc.code))),index:'AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase)))),(meta:(negate:!t),query:(match:(json.grpc.code:(query:OK,type:phrase)))),(exists:(field:json.grpc.code))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby sum latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.grpc.method.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.grpc.time_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby sum latency aggregated (split)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.grpc.method.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.grpc.time_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby percentile latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.grpc.time_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly Ruby percentile latency aggregated (split)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.tag.keyword:(query:gitaly.ruby,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.grpc.method.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderAgg:(enabled:!t,id:'3-orderAgg',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms),schema:orderAgg,type:sum),orderBy:custom,otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.grpc.time_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: goserver SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

This SLI monitors all Gitaly GRPC requests in aggregate, excluding the OperationService.
GRPC failures which are considered to be the "server's fault" are counted as errors.
The apdex score is based on a subset of GRPC methods which are expected to be fast.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Stackdriver Continuous Profiling](https://console.cloud.google.com/profiler;timespan=4h/gitaly;type=CPU/cpu?project=gitlab-production)
* [üêû Sentry Releases: gitlab/gitaly-production](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitaly-production/releases?environment=${environment})
* [üêû Sentry issues](https://sentry.gitlab.net/gitlab/gitaly-production/issues?environment=${environment})

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: goserver_op_service SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_1h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_5m{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_1h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_30m{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_node_apdex:ratio_6h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: goserver_op_service SLI Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_node_errors:ratio_1h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_component_node_errors:ratio_5m{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_component_node_errors:ratio_1h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_component_node_errors:ratio_30m{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_component_node_errors:ratio_6h{component="goserver_op_service",env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",monitor="global",type="gitaly"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="gitaly"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: goserver_op_service SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

This SLI monitors requests to Gitaly's OperationService, via its GRPC endpoint.
OperationService methods are generally expected to be slower than other Gitaly endpoints
and this is reflected in the SLI.



### Observability Tools

* [üìñ Kibana: Gitaly OperationService logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.hostname,json.grpc.method,json.grpc.request.glProjectPath,json.grpc.code,json.grpc.time_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),index:'AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Gitaly OperationService slow request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.hostname,json.grpc.method,json.grpc.request.glProjectPath,json.grpc.code,json.grpc.time_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase)))),(query:(range:(json.grpc.time_ms:(gte:30000))))),index:'AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di',sort:!(!(json.grpc.time_ms,desc)))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: Gitaly OperationService failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.hostname,json.grpc.method,json.grpc.request.glProjectPath,json.grpc.code,json.grpc.time_ms),filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase)))),(meta:(negate:!t),query:(match:(json.grpc.code:(query:OK,type:phrase)))),(exists:(field:json.grpc.code))),index:'AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly OperationService requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly OperationService failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase)))),(meta:(negate:!t),query:(match:(json.grpc.code:(query:OK,type:phrase)))),(exists:(field:json.grpc.code))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: Gitaly OperationService sum latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=AW5F1OHTiGcMMNRn84Di&_a=(filters:!((query:(match:(json.grpc.service:(query:gitaly.OperationService,type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.fqdn:(query:'$fqdn',type:phrase)))),(query:(match:(json.type:(query:gitaly,type:phrase))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.grpc.time_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.time,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.grpc.method.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.grpc.time_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Number of Git commands running concurrently per node. Lower is better.
panels.title: Inflight Git Commands per Server

panels.description: Golang uses a global lock on process spawning. In order to control contention on this lock Gitaly uses a safety valve. If a request is unable to obtain the lock within a period, a timeout occurs. These timeouts are serious and should be addressed. Non-zero is bad.
panels.title: Gitaly Spawn Timeouts per Node

panels.description: Percentage of requests that acquire a Gitaly rate-limit lock within 1 minute, by host and method
panels.title: Request % acquiring rate-limit lock within 1m, by host + method

panels.description: The amount of non-idle time consumed by nodes for this service
panels.title: Node CPU

panels.description: The maximum utilization of a single core on each node. Lower is better
panels.title: Node Maximum Single Core Utilization

panels.description: Network utilization for nodes for this service
panels.title: Node Network Utilization

panels.description: Memory utilization. Lower is better.
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description: Disk Read IO operations per second. Lower is better.
panels.title: Disk Read IOPs

panels.description: Disk Write IO operations per second. Lower is better.
panels.title: Disk Write IOPs

panels.description: Disk Read throughput datarate. Lower is better.
panels.title: Disk Read Throughput

panels.description: Disk Write throughput datarate. Lower is better.

panels.description: Total time spent in read operations across all disks on the node. Lower is better.

panels.description: Total time spent in write operations across all disks on the node. Lower is better.

panels.description: CPU scheduling waiting on the run queue, as a percentage of time. Aggregated to worst CPU per node. Lower is better.
panels.title: CPU Scheduling Waiting

panels.description: Loadavg (1 minute) per core, below 1 is better.

targets.expr:
avg by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_load1{{"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})
/
count by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", {"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})

panels.title: loadavg1 per core

panels.description: Loadavg (5 minute) per core, below 1 is better.

targets.expr:
avg by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_load5{{"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})
/
count by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", {"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})

panels.title: loadavg5 per core

panels.description: Loadavg (15 minute) per core, below 1 is better.

targets.expr:
avg by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_load15{{"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})
/
count by (environment, type, stage, fqdn) (node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", {"env": "$environment", "environment": "$environment", "fqdn": {"re": "$fqdn"}, "type": "gitaly"}})

panels.title: loadavg15 per core

panels.description:
Cgroup memory utilization per node.

Some services, notably Gitaly, are configured to run within a cgroup with a memory limit lower than the
memory limit for the node. This ensures that a traffic spike to Gitaly does not affect other services on the node.

If this resource is becoming saturated, this may indicate traffic spikes to Gitaly, abuse or possibly resource leaks in
the application. Gitaly or other git processes may be killed by the OOM killer when this resource is saturated.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      (
        container_memory_usage_bytes{id="/system.slice/gitlab-runsvdir.service", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"} -
        container_memory_cache{id="/system.slice/gitlab-runsvdir.service", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"} -
        container_memory_swap{id="/system.slice/gitlab-runsvdir.service", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      )
      /
      container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{id="/system.slice/gitlab-runsvdir.service", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: cgroup_memory component saturation: Cgroup Memory Utilization per Node

panels.description:
This resource measures average CPU utilization across an all cores in a service fleet.
If it is becoming saturated, it may indicate that the fleet needs
horizontal or vertical scaling.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      1 - avg by (environment, tier, type, stage) (
        rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[5m])
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: cpu component saturation: Average Service CPU Utilization

panels.description:
Disk space utilization per device per node.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn, device) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      (
        1 - instance:node_filesystem_avail:ratio{fstype=~"ext.|xfs", fqdn!="", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: disk_space component saturation: Disk Space Utilization per Device per Node

panels.description:
Disk sustained read IOPS utilization per node.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn, device) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[20m])
      /
      node_disk_max_read_iops{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: disk_sustained_read_iops component saturation: Disk Sustained Read IOPS Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Disk sustained read throughput utilization per node.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn, device) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[20m])
      /
      node_disk_max_read_bytes_seconds{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: disk_sustained_read_throughput component saturation: Disk Sustained Read Throughput Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Gitaly runs on Google Cloud's Persistent Disk product. This has a published sustained
maximum write IOPS value. This value can be exceeded for brief periods.

If a single node is consistently reaching saturation, it may indicate a noisy-neighbour repository,
possible abuse or it may indicate that the node needs rebalancing.

More information can be found at
https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/disks/performance.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn, device) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[20m])
      /
      node_disk_max_write_iops{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: disk_sustained_write_iops component saturation: Disk Sustained Write IOPS Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Gitaly runs on Google Cloud's Persistent Disk product. This has a published sustained
maximum write throughput value. This value can be exceeded for brief periods.

If a single node is consistently reaching saturation, it may indicate a noisy-neighbour repository,
possible abuse or it may indicate that the node needs rebalancing.

More information can be found at
https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/disks/performance.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn, device) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[20m])
      /
      node_disk_max_write_bytes_seconds{device!="sda", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: disk_sustained_write_throughput component saturation: Disk Sustained Write Throughput Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Memory utilization per device per node.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      instance:node_memory_utilization:ratio{fqdn!="", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: memory component saturation: Memory Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Open file descriptor utilization per instance.

Saturation on file descriptor limits may indicate a resource-descriptor leak in the application.

As a temporary fix, you may want to consider restarting the affected process.
 Lower is better.
panels.title: open_fds component saturation: Open file descriptor utilization per instance

panels.description:
Average CPU utilization per Node.

If average CPU is satured, it may indicate that a fleet is in need to horizontal or vertical scaling. It may also indicate
imbalances in load in a fleet.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      avg without(cpu, mode) (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{fqdn!="", mode="idle", env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}[5m]))
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: single_node_cpu component saturation: Average CPU Utilization per Node

panels.description:
Go's memory allocation strategy can make it look like a Go process is saturating memory when measured using RSS, when in fact
the process is not at risk of memory saturation. For this reason, we measure Go processes using the `go_memstat_alloc_bytes`
metric instead of RSS.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      sum by (environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
        go_memstats_alloc_bytes{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      )
      /
      sum by (environment, tier, type, stage, fqdn) (
        node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{env="$environment",environment="$environment",fqdn=~"$fqdn",type="gitaly"}
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: go_memory component saturation: Go Memory Utilization per Node
